item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Should I kill myself, or have a cup of coffee?" -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Peace is the only battle worth waging." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "And he knew, also, what the old man was thinking as his tears flowed, and he, Rieux, thought it too: that a loveless world is a dead world, and always there comes an hour when one is weary of prisons, of one's work, and of devotion to duty, and all one craves for is a loved face, the warmth and wonder of a loving heart." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "If absolute truth belongs to anyone in this world, it certainly does not belong to the man or party that claims to possess it." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "I had only a little time left and I didn't want to waste it on God." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "We are all born mad. Some remain so." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Warning: If you are reading this then this warning is for you. Every word you read of this useless fine print is another second off your life. Don't you have other things to do? Is your life so empty that you honestly can't think of a better way to spend these moments? Or are you so impressed with authority that you give respect and credence to all that claim it? Do you read everything you're supposed to read? Do you think every thing you're supposed to think? Buy what you're told to want? Get out of your apartment. Meet a member of the opposite sex. Stop the excessive shopping and masturbation. Quit your job. Start a fight. Prove you're alive. If you don't claim your humanity you will become a statistic. You have been warned." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how careful you are, there's going to be the sense you missed something, the collapsed feeling under your skin that you didn't experience it all. There's that fallen heart feeling that you rushed right through the moments where you should've been paying attention. Well, get used to that feeling. That's how your whole life will feel some day. This is all practice." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Muhamad add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Fuck me. I'm so tired of being me. Me beautiful. Me ugly. Blonde. Brunette. A million fucking fashion makeovers that only leave me trapped being me. Who I was before the accident is just a story now. Everything before now, before now, before now, is just a story I carry around. I guess that would apply to anybody in the world. What I need is a new story about who I am. What I need to do is fuck up so bad I can't save myself." -- Chuck Palahniuk
